attributes.action: Throw out proposed EU legislation on Motorbikes, Trikes and Quad bikes
attributes.additional_details: Petition proposed by UKIP MEP Marta Andreasen (South East England): The EU is proposing the Regulation on approval and market surveillance of two- or three-wheel vehicles and quadricycles : COM(2010)0542 We call on the Government at European Council, Ministerial, at Commons and at Lord's level, as well as British MEPs and MPs to oppose, in the strongest terms, this proposed legislation.
